thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com
thread.title: Bijan Ansari

author: Bijan Ansari
title: Bijan Ansari
text: Thank you for your recent prompt delivery of my order. I packets I received were exactly the same as pictured on your sight and all three Lavazza Super Crema bags were vacuum packed and intact. In my previous order of this coffee the bag was delivered in a transparent and partially torn bag. I brought this to your attention and you immediately sent me another bag by UPS to replace the damage and wrong package. I am very pleased with your customer service and I will continue to be a loyal customer. Please keep up the good job and make sure the coffee bags are exactly the same as pictured on your website.
